title: Floyd Mayweather, Alfred Liggins, Back To Jail, Chicken Lovers and more.
itunes:title: Floyd Mayweather, Alfred Liggins, Back To Jail, Chicken Lovers and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve shares with us a Friday fun fact. The CLO warns a supervisor about letting a pen get dipped in her company ink. The boxer that we all pay to see get his ass whooped is in the middle of some controversy again. Fool #2 has some interesting observations in regards to chicken. The CEO of Urban One and TV One stopped by to talk specifically about creating history in Richmond, VA! Pay attention and lookout for Pimpin's upset game of the week if you wanna get paid! Would You Rather was just not fair today. Google's FrightGeist got some numbers for you. Did we get a remix to Would You Rather? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve mentioned one thing that everybody has to go through.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
